description: This is a regional/urban flat trail with some paved road and some riverside gravel paths.  Good for commuters and light recreational riders.  Runs in BC's Lower Mainland from Fraser River at New Westminster through Burnaby along Brunette River, Burnaby Lake and Still Creek through Vancouver to the Seawall Trail.  Unmarked as yet, but there are maps and more info at www.vacc.bc.ca/centralvalley/ic*This is an urban trail, which doesn't have any technical obstacles for mountain biking. The trail is mostly paved, so can be easily done by commuter bike.
title: Central Valley Greenway
